name: Super Mario on Scratch Reboot - HTML Port
name_original: Super Mario on Scratch Reboot - HTML Port
description:
This is Super Mario on Scratch Reboot that is now ported to itch.io!

It may take a little while to load.

Here is the game running on Scratch https://scratch.mit.edu/projects/442934148/

Credits -

Flughand - Feblu

Super Mario 64 - Bob-omb Battlefield [Remix] Qumu

Nintendo for Mario, sounds/music

Me for the art.

Scrolling engine - griffpatch on Scratch

Advice and ideas - @FunnyAnimatorJimTV on Scratch

POSSDbyiahufva on Scratch and Japan Cat

Special Thanks to -

_meow_gobo_ on Scratch

b1048546 on Scratch

Bunnynightfan on Scratch

triangle5820 on Scratch
